    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean locationCanExplode​(TownyWorld world, org.bukkit.Location target)
    Test if this location has explosions enabled.
    void onCreatureSpawn​(org.bukkit.event.entity.CreatureSpawnEvent event)
    Handles removal of newly spawned animals/monsters for use in the world-removal and town-removal lists.
    void onEntityChangeBlockEvent​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityChangeBlockEvent event)
    Handles Wither Explosions and Enderman Thieving block protections
    void onEntityCombustByEntityEvent​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityCombustByEntityEvent event)
    Prevent fire arrows and charges igniting players when PvP is disabled Can also prevent tnt from destroying armorstands
    void onEntityDamageByEntity​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageByEntityEvent event)
    Prevent PvP and PvM damage dependent upon PvP settings and location.
    void onEntityDamageByEntityEvent​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageByEntityEvent event)
    Prevent explosions from hurting non-living entities in towns.
    void onEntityDeath​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDeathEvent event)
    Prevent monsters from dropping blocks if within an arena plot.
    void onEntityExplode​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityExplodeEvent event)
    Handles explosion regeneration in War (inside towns,) and from regular non-war causes (outside towns.)
    void onEntityInteract​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityInteractEvent event)
    Handles crop trampling as well as pressure plates (switch use)
    void onEntityTargetLivingEntity​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityTargetLivingEntityEvent event)
    Prevents players from stealing animals in personally owned plots To tempt an animal in a personally owned plot requires the ability to also destroy dirt blocks there.
    void onHangingBreak​(org.bukkit.event.hanging.HangingBreakEvent event)
    Handles protection of item frames and other Hanging types.
    void onHangingPlace​(org.bukkit.event.hanging.HangingPlaceEvent event)
    Placing of hanging objects like Item Frames.
    void onLingeringPotionSplashEvent​(org.bukkit.event.entity.LingeringPotionSplashEvent event)
    Prevent lingering potion damage on players in non PVP areas
    void onPigHitByLightning​(org.bukkit.event.entity.PigZapEvent event)  
    void onPotionSplashEvent​(org.bukkit.event.entity.PotionSplashEvent event)
    Prevent splash potion damage on players in non PVP areas

    • onEntityDamageByEntityEvent

      public void onEntityDamageByEntityEvent​(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageByEntityEvent event)
      Prevent explosions from hurting non-living entities in towns. Includes: Armorstands, itemframes, animals, endercrystals, minecarts Prevent explosions from hurting players if Event War is active and WarzoneBlockPermissions' explosions tag is set to true.
      Parameters:
      event -
